item.title: International Day Commemorating the Victims of Acts of Violence Based on Religion or Belief
item.description: Introduction The 22 August was designated a day to commemorate the victims of acts of violence based on religion or belief by the UN General Assembly in 2019. You can find out more here: https://www.ohchr.org/EN/NewsEvents/Pages/DisplayNews.aspx?NewsID=27396&LangID=E. You can access the original document here: https://undocs.org/Home/Mobile?FinalSymbol=A%2FRES%2F73%2F296&Language=E&DeviceType=Mobile
